properties.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued February 10 at 9:02AM CST by NWS Norman OK
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY.

THE DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR JORDEN RODGERS, BLACK,
MALE, 7 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET, 60 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, WITH
LONG DREADLOCKS, UNKNOWN CLOTHING, AND JULIEN RODGERS, BLACK, MALE, 2
YEARS OLD, 2 FEET, 25 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND UNKNOWN
CLOTHING.

POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR JOHNNIE RAY PALMORE, BLACK, MALE, 33 YEARS
OLD, 5 FEET 11 INCHES, 155 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, HAZEL EYES AND GOLD
DYED LONG DREADLOCKS, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION.

THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN DALLAS, TX.

LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR
IMMEDIATE DANGER.

IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE DALLAS
POLICE DEPARTMENT.

NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS DALLAS PD AT 2 1 4 6 7 1 4 3 1 2.
